text:
The release of water from Mettur Dam for farm activities in Cauvery Delta region was further brought down on Friday evening. About 9,000 cusecs of water was released from the dam for the last few days and it was brought down to 6,000 cusecs., PWD sources said.

The water level in the dam stood at 75.55 feet on Saturday against its full level of 120 feet. The water storage level stood at 37.666 tmc. The dam was receiving an inflow of 178 cusecs.

Anther 400 cusecs of water is being let out from the dam for irrigation activities in more than 40,000 acres in the three districts of Salem, Namakkal and Erode.
title: Mettur Dam level
